column3: PURPOSE (should be a verb phrase to sound right while installing)
is the command to start xorg
is a cli to do keyboard presses
can record and splice video and audio on the command line
is a patch of pulseaudio for my headphones
is a terminal interface for mpd
is the patrician's choice video player
is a utility to fix version problems
lets you read man pages of programs
is the best CLI text editor
is a better version of cat
is a better version of du
is a better version of ls
is a better version of find
is a better version of cp
is a better version of cd
is nothing. Tip : dont type sl instead of ls
is a monitor manager (GUI for xrandr)
is the calc module for rofi
is a good font (support for emojis)
